REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f1560 reute r f BC-CCL-INDUSTRIES-PURCHA 04-08 0050

TEXT.TITLE: CCL INDUSTRIES PURCHASES STAKE IN MONOBLOC
TEXT.BODY: <CCL Industries Inc> said it purchased a majority interest in Monobloc U.S.A. from Envases Metalurgicos de Alava of Spain. Terms were not disclosed. CCL also said it agreed to exchange present and future technology with Envases. Reuter
